page.title: 08HAYWARD AND BUSH LTD.
page.content: {Hayward and Bush}carry out preservation work on old buildings, loft insulation, cavity wall insulation using fibre glass (costing Â£400 for an average house) damp proof coursing, timber treatment against woodworm and dry rot etc. They have been in business since 1977 and on the airfield since Nov. 1984. They are growing and now employ 3 people. {G.C.FISHER. Make and hire out engines. Have a contract to build frames for Lotus cars, carry out trailer repairs, bypass site work and general engineering and welding. Bulldozer hire. {E.T. PAPER WASTE. Buy in and reprocess paper waste. {L AND G STRUCTURAL Fruit and vegetable delivery service.
